item.title: physics761
item.description: Supersymmetry (T) - physics761 Course Supersymmetry (T) Course No. physics761 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT/ST Requirements: Quantum Field Theory I Preparation: Form of Testing and Examination: Individual Oral Examinations Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: Teach the students the basics of supersymmetric field theory and how it can be tested at the LHC.
